channel.title: Looking For Good Coders
channel.description:
I have finally been able to get a server up etc. I am planning some MAJOR changes to it and I will need your help. I use Perfectscape as a base, which is also Phonescape I believe. I cant code for my life, just begining, I know how to add TUT's and such, as I've added a few.
Back to the point, here is where I will need all the help I can get...
I Need To Know How To:
-Delete Shops -Make it a normal server -No lvls in Wildy, all wildy is PvP -Fight Pits -Full Fight Cave -Move NPC's and make some drops rare -How to delete some commands.
(Note) There is possibly more, but I am forgetting it now that I've decided to post, I will keep adding everything I forget. Maybe if you guys could give me some tips on how to do such things, it would be a great help, in the meantime I will be looking through the TUT's again, looking for these things!
Any codes of the ones above will be rewarded with RS Gp and Adminship on my server when I release it!

item.title: Looking For Good Coders
item.dc:creator: @Buell Buell
item.description:
@Buell wrote:

My server is already PK server, I’m want to make it so the only places it’s PvP is in wildy, fight pits or duel arena or Cwars.

And I’m also willing to pay RS Gp for somebody who can provide me codes for all of these![br][size=1]Posted on: April 08, 2007, 01:46:09 AM[/size][hr]Also trying to find out how to Autocast mage, and only using mage if you have runes.[br][size=1]Posted on: April 08, 2007, 02:50:21 AM[/size][hr]Yup, still need help![br][size=1]Posted on: April 08, 2007, 03:11:42 AM[/size][hr]Anybody?

Read full topic

item.title: Looking For Good Coders
item.dc:creator: @Buell Buell
item.description:
@Buell wrote:

I have finally been able to get a server up etc. I am planning some MAJOR changes to it and I will need your help. I use Perfectscape as a base, which is also Phonescape I believe. I cant code for my life, just begining, I know how to add TUT’s and such, as I’ve added a few.

Back to the point, here is where I will need all the help I can get…

I Need To Know How To:

-Delete Shops
-Make it a normal server
-No lvls in Wildy, all wildy is PvP
-Fight Pits
-Full Fight Cave
-Move NPC’s and make some drops rare
-How to delete some commands.

(Note) There is possibly more, but I am forgetting it now that I’ve decided to post, I will keep adding everything I forget. Maybe if you guys could give me some tips on how to do such things, it would be a great help, in the meantime I will be looking through the TUT’s again, looking for these things!

Any codes of the ones above will be rewarded with RS Gp and Adminship on my server when I release it!
